titleStmt.title: English Iliads, or a sea-fight reviewed in a poem occasioned by the death of a person of honour slain in the late vvar between the English and the Dutch. By J.W. Together with An Irenicum, or reflections on the trumpeter and conditions of peace.
titleStmt.author: J. W.
Warly, John, d. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jonathan Edwin at the three Roses in Ludgate Street,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Warley by Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.

place.placeName: the three Roses in Ludgate Street
